name: Vivago AI
description: Vivago AI is a free AI-powered platform for creating high-quality images, videos, and 3D models from text or image prompts.
longDescription: Vivago AI is an innovative platform that leverages advanced artificial intelligence to simplify and enhance creative content creation for users of all skill levels. It enables users to transform text prompts or static images into stunning videos, images, and 3D models, catering to needs in storytelling, marketing, and education. The platform offers a freemium model, providing free access to core features with optional paid plans for advanced capabilities. Its intuitive interface and powerful editing tools, like Magic Eraser and Video Enhance, make professional-grade content creation accessible. Vivago AI also fosters a vibrant community where users can share creations, exchange ideas, and find inspiration. The platform aims to streamline workflows and empower creators by removing technical barriers.
features: Text-to-Video transforms written prompts into engaging videos for storytelling or marketing.
Image-to-Video animates static images by adding motion and depth for dynamic visuals.
Text-to-Image generates high-quality images from text descriptions, ideal for creative projects.
Magic Eraser removes unwanted objects from images seamlessly, enhancing visual clarity.
Video Enhance upscales videos to 4K resolution for sharper, professional-grade output.
Magic Expand increases image perspective up to two times, adding context and detail.
AI Replace allows precise edits to specific image areas without affecting the composition.
Text-to-3D creates detailed 3D models from text prompts for innovative design applications.
Magic Brush animates specific parts of images with a simple brush stroke for lively visuals.
AI Caption automatically transcribes and subtitles videos for improved accessibility.
Easy Edit provides intuitive tools to trim, split, merge, and adjust video speed effortlessly.
Squish It adds playful 3D animations with dynamic squishing effects to designs.
Poke It enhances 3D models with interactive poking effects for engaging content.
Background Remover replaces image or video backgrounds to match creative visions.

faqs.question: What is Vivago AI used for?
faqs.answer: Vivago AI is used to create high-quality images, videos, and 3D models from text or image prompts, ideal for marketing, storytelling, and creative projects.

faqs.question: Is Vivago AI free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vivago AI offers a free plan with daily credits for core features, though premium plans unlock additional capabilities.

faqs.question: Do I need to sign up to use Vivago AI?
faqs.answer: Yes, users must register with a Gmail or Discord account to access Vivago AI’s web or app-based features.

faqs.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
faqs.answer: Video generation typically takes a few minutes, depending on the complexity of the prompt and settings.

faqs.question: Can I edit images or videos on Vivago AI?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vivago AI provides tools like Magic Eraser, AI Replace, and Video Enhance for easy editing and refinement.

faqs.question: What types of content can Vivago AI create?
faqs.answer: Vivago AI supports text-to-image, image-to-video, text-to-video, and text-to-3D content creation for various applications.

faqs.question: Is Vivago AI suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, its user-friendly interface makes it accessible for users with no prior editing experience.

faqs.question: Can I use Vivago AI for social media content?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, Vivago AI is ideal for creating short-form videos and visuals for platforms like Instagram and TikTok.

faqs.question: Does Vivago AI support 4K resolution?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Video Enhance feature allows users to upscale videos to 4K for high-quality output.

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with others on Vivago AI?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vivago AI’s community feature lets users share creations, apply trending prompts, and exchange ideas.
